name: Grand Ballroom Venue
description: Elegant ballroom with crystal chandeliers and marble floors. Perfect for grand celebrations with capacity up to 500 guests. Features include bridal suite, outdoor garden, and premium catering kitchen.

name: Gourmet Catering Co.
description: Premium catering service specializing in farm-to-table cuisine. Customizable menus for any event size. Offers buffet, plated, and family-style service with vegan and gluten-free options.

name: Luminous Photography
description: Award-winning wedding photographers capturing your special moments with artistic flair and attention to detail. Includes full day coverage, engagement shoot, and premium photo album.

name: Elegant Decor Studio
description: Transform any space into a magical setting with our premium decoration services. From minimalist to extravagant themes. Specializing in floral arrangements, lighting design, and custom backdrops.

name: Glamour Makeup Artistry
description: Professional makeup artists creating stunning looks for your special day. Specializing in natural and glamorous styles. Includes trial session, hair styling, and touch-ups throughout the event.

name: SoundWave DJ Services
description: Experienced DJs keeping your guests on the dance floor all night. Professional equipment and seamless transitions. Includes sound system, lighting effects, MC services, and playlist customization.

name: Luxury Transport Co.
description: Arrive in style with our fleet of luxury vehicles. Professional chauffeurs ensuring a smooth and elegant experience. Options include limousines, vintage cars, and party buses.

name: Corporate Branding Experts
description: Complete branding solutions for corporate events. From concept to execution, we bring your brand to life. Services include brand design, event signage, promotional materials, and digital displays.

name: Wonderland Kids Events
description: Creating magical birthday parties and events for children. Themed experiences that kids will remember forever. Includes character entertainment, party games, themed decorations, and face painting.

name: Serenity Funeral Services
description: Compassionate and dignified funeral services. Helping families honor their loved ones with respect and care. Services include memorial planning, floral arrangements, catering, and transportation.

name: Sweet Dreams Bakery
description: Artisanal cakes and desserts crafted with premium ingredients. Custom designs to match your event theme perfectly. Offers custom cake design, cupcakes, dessert tables, and tasting sessions.

name: Perfect Day Planners
description: Full-service wedding planning from engagement to honeymoon. Stress-free planning ensuring your perfect day. Services include full planning, day-of coordination, vendor management, and timeline creation.

name: Garden Estate Venue
description: Historic estate with beautiful gardens and elegant interiors. Perfect for romantic outdoor ceremonies. Features include outdoor ceremony space, indoor reception hall, bridal suite, and full catering kitchen.

name: Capture Moments Studio
description: Documentary-style photography capturing authentic moments. Natural light specialists with a modern aesthetic. Includes 8-hour coverage, second shooter, online gallery, and print rights.

name: Elite Catering Services
description: Upscale catering with international cuisine options. Professional service staff ensuring a seamless dining experience. Offers fine dining, cocktail hour, late night snacks, and dietary accommodations.
